thread.title: Walmart could buy 40 percent of India's Flipkart - sources

title: Walmart could buy 40 percent of India's Flipkart - sources
text:
Walmart could buy 40 percent of India's Flipkart - sources 2:17pm GMT - 01:33 
Walmart is in talks to buy a stake of at least 40 percent in Indian e-commerce firm Flipkart, in a direct challenge to Amazon.com Inc in Asia’s third-largest economy. Silvia Antonioli reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Walmart is in talks to buy a stake of at least 40 percent in Indian e-commerce firm Flipkart, in a direct challenge to Amazon.com Inc in Asia’s third-largest economy. Silvia Antonioli reports.
